metadata.description: Rule-based translation dictionaries with dataset-informed word mappings. NO ML MODELS - Dictionary reference only.
metadata.note: Datasets used for validation and word mapping reference. All translations are rule-based and manually curated.

sun.meaning: star at center of solar system

friend.meaning: person with whom you have bond

walk.meaning: move on foot at normal speed

read.meaning: look at and understand written words

write.meaning: mark letters or words on surface

read.meaning: look at and understand written text

reading.meaning: present continuous: in process of reading

translate.meaning: convert from one language to another

desi.meaning: pertaining to South Asian culture and traditions

read.meaning: look at and understand written text

reading.meaning: present continuous: in process of reading
